body_html:
@indigohedgehog We have to keep up with the official package. So the answer is no. But I'll rebuild the packages for 0.4 in CI and you may try that.
@room3dev Wait a few days and you can get the official packages for your configuration if your card is of Pascal or Volta architecture.

body:
@indigohedgehog We have to keep up with the official package. So the answer is no. But I'll rebuild the packages for 0.4 in CI and you may try that.
@room3dev Wait a few days and you can get the official packages for your configuration if your card is of Pascal or Volta architecture.
